dublin_core.dcvalue: We describe use of an improvised light source to perform cystoscopy and PUV resection while working in a resource poor setting The light emitted from a mobile telephone LED iPhone 6 was sufficient to perform the procedure and there was an excellent surgical outcome We hope that this report may prove to be helpful to colleagues working in similar circumstances with limited resources
Improvise, Adapt, Overcome: mobile phone LED used as a light source for cystoscopy and resection of posterior urethral valves in a low-cost setting.
